titleInfo.title: Bill Anderson and Mary Lou Turner at Red Bank Valley High School (18442)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing Bill Anderson and the Po' Boys, Mary Lou Turner, and Keepin' It Country at Red Bank Valley High School on March 19. Poster features metal photoplates of Bill Anderson and Mary Lou Turner. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/41591/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
